title: Holy shit, this game.
body:
It boggles my mind how many times in a single sitting of League of Legends that the number of inputs this game flat-out ignores or changes on its own.

I can't count the number of times in my last game alone that my ignite was still off cooldown after pressing it 3 times in a fight or how many times the game threw my fucking shuriken in the complete opposite direction I told it to.

It makes me so sick to my stomach when the game doesn't function at the basic level.

I'm so exhausted with being pissed off all the time over this crap.  Why is this happening?
